mapper.select: SELECT s.memo, s.created_date, m.nickname, p.thumbnail, p.title, p.post_num FROM member_scrap AS s, member AS m, post AS p WHERE s.member_num = #{member_num} AND s.post_num = #{post_num} AND p.member_num = m.num AND s.post_num = p.post_num
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM member_scrap WHERE member_num = #{member_num} AND post_num = #{post_num}
mapper.select: SELECT s.memo, s.created_date, m.nickname, p.thumbnail, p.title, p.post_num FROM member_scrap AS s, member AS m, post AS p WHERE s.member_num = #{member_num} AND p.member_num = m.num AND s.post_num = p.post_num ORDER BY s.num DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_scrap(member_num, post_num, memo, created_date) VALUES(#{member_num}, #{post_num}, #{memo}, now())
